HIV.IND.92.NUM

code: Numerator

description: Number of people living with HIV diagnosed with HCV infection who have completed HCV treatment and had a sustained virological response (SVR). SVR is assessed by a viral load measurement 12–24 weeks after the end of treatment.

population.description: Number of people living with HIV and co-infected with HCV who completed HCV treatment and were assessed for sustained virological response

Number of people living with HIV diagnosed with HCV infection who have completed HCV treatment and had a sustained virological response (SVR). SVR is assessed by a viral load measurement 12–24 weeks after the end of treatment.
